user_query: I want to organize a charity event to raise awareness about healthcare issues. Can you please provide me with guidelines for organizing such events? Additionally, I would like to gather information about healthcare mailing lists to invite relevant professionals. It would be helpful if you could provide me with the nutritional analysis of common food items for planning the event's menu.

TaskList.description: Research and compile guidelines for organizing charity events focused on healthcare awareness.
Gather information about healthcare mailing lists to invite relevant professionals to the event.
Obtain nutritional analysis of common food items for event menu planning.
